title: Dominion & 3v3 AI v Co-op... RIOT PLS!
body:
So. It's been a couple years now aye.
{{item:3070}} 
Maybe getting the Dominion map, and a 3v3 AI vs Co-op would be a good thing to start rolling out to the OCE.
From there, maybe... just maybe... I wont have to log into NA just to play Dominion. I mean after a hard days Ranked. ARAMS are a nice way to calm the nerves a bit... but sometimes I just want to 3v3 some AI or Bless those cotton Dominion socks for some circular fun.
I mean, SR is looking great... and will always be the very best. *insert pokemon theme song*

Dominion... well,
I just miss it is all.

{{summoner:17}} {{summoner:17}} {{summoner:17}} {{summoner:17}} {{summoner:17}} 

NEVER FORGET.

replies.body:
Not gonna lie, I wouldn't be as bothered about this if they actually told us what the progress is, but as far as I've seen they're actively ignoring all questions about it. It's getting kind of annoying, especially since they're now literally making a new map for a temporary event, and yet they still can't tell us what's going on with 3v3 and dominion.

I think they're just trolling the community at this point, and it's really not cool.
